participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Creative and expressive, enjoys sharing experiences and values honesty.
participant_1.background: I love seafood because I fish for it myself. I went camping with my family at a lake and we all had a great time swimming, hiking and roasting marshmallows over the campfire. I dress for my audience. I used to lie to my parents, but now I am more honest with them. I'm a creative person who loves to express myself through music, drawing, and painting.

participant_2.name: Jordan
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and laid-back, enjoys cycling and spending time with pets.
participant_2.background: I love a big bowl of chili after a long day of riding my bike. I've had the same job for 8 years. I went for a walk today after work, even though I was tired. Instead of eating cake, I went for a walk in the woods at midnight. My cat Sherlock and I love to watch mystery movies together.

content.text: I love seafood because I fish for it myself. What are some of your favorite foods?
I love a big bowl of chili after a long day of riding my bike.  Do you like to cook?
I like to cook but I'm not very good at it. My family loves when I cook seafood though.
I'm not much of a cook either. Maybe I'll learn to cook seafood.
That would be great! I love sharing my seafood dishes with my friends and family.
I have to say, the best chili I've ever had was made by my neighbor.
Oh wow! I'm going to have to try that recipe.
I'm sure you'll love it.  It's a pretty simple recipe.
That's great! I love simple recipes.
It is a little bit spicy though, so you may want to tone it down a bit.
Oh, I love spicy food!  That's perfect.
Great! If you're ever in the neighborhood, I'll make you some chili.
Thanks!  I'll have to take you up on that offer.
No problem!  I'm always happy to share my food.
